parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the passenger occupant detection system can cause the passenger airbag to shut off, even when a passenger is present, which can lead to increased risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The passenger airbag warning light comes on
a message appears on the dashboard indicating a safety malfunction
the airbag is turned off intermittently
the airbag warning light and chime go off continuously.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Parts Distribution Disconnect for Recall Repairs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of parts for recall repairs can leave vehicles unrepaired, putting occupants at risk of injury or death due to faulty airbags or other safety issues.
symptoms: The contact receives notification of a recall but is told that parts are not available
the contact is unable to schedule a repair due to part unavailability
the manufacturer exceeds a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Front Crash Mitigation System (Audi Presence)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Audi Presence system can lead to accidents or increase the risk of accidents, as it is designed to stop the car in emergency situations.
symptoms: The system does not work
despite being a certified pre-owned vehicle with an original windshield.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective tires can cause blowouts, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Multiple bubbles in the sidewalls of the tires
requiring frequent replacements.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden explosion of the sunroof can cause injuries, damage to the vehicle, and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: The sunroof explodes without any external impact
causing a loud noise and potentially shattering glass.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sharp Metal Trim in Door Panel
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sharp metal trim can cause lacerations, injuries, and potentially lead to infections or permanent scarring.
symptoms: The metal trim detaches from the door panel
causing cuts or lacerations to occupants.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of vehicle control can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly loses control
veering out of the lane
and potentially spinning out of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The overheating of the seat heater can cause burns, damage to the seat, and potentially start a fire, which can lead to injuries or accidents.
symptoms: The seat feels excessively hot
the seat is damaged or melted
there is a burning sensation while sitting on the seat.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power window can cause inconvenience, distraction, and potentially lead to accidents if the driver is unable to properly control the window.
symptoms: The power window stops functioning
the window is stuck in the down position
multiple power cycles do not correct the problem.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended movement of the brake pedal can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal moves on its own
the vehicle slows down or stops without input
the brake pedal inclines upwards towards the dashboard.
